data.message: What?! excuse me as far as I'm aware throughout the history of man and the history of the HOLY BIBLE, if you would only read it you would seethat Pride used to be and still is a bad word, pride hurts and divides unless it's the pride that you get from a job well done but this doesn't fall under that category . I'm warning you facebook you keep this deal up you will be permanently deleted by me and I bet a host of other people will too. I've got too much Pride in the way GOD created Male and Female. this so-called Pride for homosexuality is stupid and even animals will testify to that
